name: Cartwheel
title: getcartwheel.com
payoff: Animate characters easily on any device
shortDescription: Cartwheel is a versatile animation tool designed for creating and animating characters across various media like videos, games, and social media. Users can easily combine motions for complex performances and create or upload fully rigged characters. Ideal for animators looking to streamline their workflow on both desktop and mobile platforms, Cartwheel enhances creative freedom and efficiency.
pros: Supports uploading and rigging own characters

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Adobe Character Animator
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers live motion capture and real-time animation

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Blender
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Open-source and fully integrated 3D creation suite
